metadata.title: CVE-2016-9480 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: libdwarf 2016-10-21 allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial of service by using the "malformed dwarf file" approach, related to a "Heap Buffer Over-read" issue affecting the dwarf_util.c component, aka DW201611-006.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161124-1').
